text: faerdu ean 'amr allah wshkrh wakadhabuu alrsl, fa'arsalna ealayhim alsayl aljarf alshadid aldhy khrrab alsad waghrq albsatyn, wbddalnahm bijanatayhim almthmrtyn janatayn dhwatay 'ukul khmt, wahu althmr almr alkryh altem, wathl wahu shajar shabih balttarfa' la thamar lh, waqalil min shajar alnnabq kthyr alshwk. dhlk altbdyl min khayr 'iilaa sharun bsbb kfrhm, wedm shkrhm nieam allh, wama neaqb bhdha aleiqab alshadid 'iilaa aljahwd almabaligh fi alkfr, yjaza bfelh mathalaan bmthl
